pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Rank Regression Models with Pivotal Monte Carlo Methods for Reliability Analysis // Fast linear regression with optional plotting position selections for Weibull, lognormal, and Gumbel distributions including right censored data. Implements 3rd parameter optimizations and a fast pivotal Monte Carlo engine for goodness of fit and confidence interval determination. Built to be a reverse depend for package abrem "Abernethy Reliability Methods".
